articles.author: Our Bureau
articles.title: Serum Institute ships first R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine to Africa - BusinessLine
articles.description: Serum Institute ships R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine to Africa, marking a milestone in global fight against malaria.
articles.content:
Vaccine makerSerum Institute of India has shipped its first R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine consignment to Africa. 
This is the second malaria vaccine authorised globally for children in malaria-endemi… [+2532 chars]
